product_name: PocketFuel Cold Brew Coffee Energy Gel Shots
long_description: PocketFuel Cold Brew Coffee Energy Gel Shots are a rich creamy blend of cold-brewed, organic, fair-trade coffee with a touch of organic coconut milk to help get you going and keep you focused. Slow brewed to reduce acidity and enhance taste while delivering a great source of antioxidants. Fresh, organic and sustainably sourced coffee beans. Cold brewing produces a sweeter coffee that is approximately 67% less acidic than coffee brewed by conventional hot-brew methods. Texture is like pudding in a pouch; taste is 100% coffee. PocketFuel Cold Brew Coffee Energy Gel Shots are vegan and free of soy, dairy and gluten. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: PocketFuel Cold Brew Coffee Energy Gel Shots are a rich creamy blend of cold-brewed, organic, fair-trade coffee with a touch of organic coconut milk to help get you going and keep you focused.
